titleStmt.title: Abel redevivus, or, The dead yet speaking by T. Fuller and other eminent divines.
titleStmt.author: Fuller, Thomas, 1608-1661.

notesStmt.note: Epistle to the reader signed: Tho. Fuller.
Consists of biographical sketches of various Protestant divines and theologians by Fuller, Daniel Featley, Thomas Gataker, and others, with occasional verse by Francis Quarles and John Quarles.

The port. and 20 p. inserted after p. 440, containing "The life and death of the late reverend and worthy prelate, Lancelot Andrewes," by Henry Isaacson, were also issued separately with title: An exact narration of the life and death of Lancelot Andrewes.
Reproduction of the original in the Harvard University Library.
